Package com.SimonFraserUniversity.DucDuyPham

Class MazeFactory

java.lang.Object
com.SimonFraserUniversity.DucDuyPham.MazeFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnchantedMazeFactory
public class MazeFactory extends Object
Abstract factory: Factory class for creating new maze components: Maze, Room, Wall, and Door.
